rooms.name: GryffindorCommonRoom
rooms.description: You are in the Gryffindor Common Room.

directions.loserMessage: Filch and Mrs. Norris have caught you! GAME OVER.

items.itemDescription: Do you want to pick up the Cloak of Invisibility?

rooms.name: SecondFloorCorridor
rooms.description: You are in the second floor corridor. You can see the Portrait of the Fat Lady and the grand staircase.

rooms.name: GrandStaircase
rooms.description: You are on the Grand Staircase. You can go to the second, third, fourth, or seventh floor.

rooms.name: ThirdFloorCorridor
rooms.description: You are in the Third Floor Corridor. The mystery room is to your right and the charms corridor is to your left. You can see the Grand Staircase.

directions.loser message: You couldn't unlock the door and Filch caught you! Well, well, well, we are in trouble! GAME OVER.

rooms.name: FourthFloorCorridor
rooms.description: You are in the fourth floor corridor. The Defense Against the Dark Arts classroom is to your left and Greenhouse One is to your right. You can see the Grand Staircase.

rooms.name: SeventhFloorCorridor
rooms.description: You are on the seventh floor. The Room of Requirement is to your left. You can see the Grand Staircase.

rooms.name: CharmsCorridor
rooms.description: You are on the charms corridor. The third floor corridor is to your left and the Charms classroom is in front of you. You can see the Grand Staircase.

rooms.name: CharmsClassroom
rooms.description: You are in the charms classroom.

items.itemDescription: The Alohomora Spell lets you open locked doors.

rooms.name: DefenseAgainstTheDarkArtsClassroom
rooms.description: You are in the Defense Against the Dark Arts classroom.

items.itemDescription: Expelliarmus lets you disarm your opponent.
LumosSolem allows you to set things on fire. It can be used against Devil's Snare.

rooms.name: RoomOfRequirement
rooms.description: You are in the Room of Requirement.

items.itemDescription: Do you want to pick up the harp?

rooms.name: MysteryRoom
rooms.description: You are in the Mystery Room. Fluffy the three-headed dog is guarding the trapdoor.

directions.loserMessage: Fluffy ate you and you died a most painful death. GAME OVER.

rooms.name: DevilsSnareRoom
rooms.description: You are trapped in Devil's Snare!

directions.loserMessage: The Devil's Snare strangled you and you died a most painful death. GAME OVER.

rooms.name: KeyRoom
rooms.description: You are trapped in trapped in the Key Room! You can either use a broom to fly out or apparate.

directions.loserMessage: You can't fly! You fell and died! GAME OVER.
You can't apparate! You splinched yourself and died! GAME OVER.

rooms.name: MirrorRoom
rooms.description: You have reached the mirror room and obtained the Sorcerer's Stone! But now, Professor Quirrel is attacking you! You can touch him or curse him.

directions.loserMessage: You cannot touch Quirrel. Voldemort kills you and you die. GAME OVER
You can't use this spell! Quirrel kills you and you die! GAME OVER.

rooms.name: FinalRoom
rooms.description: You have won! Professor Dumbledore thanks you!

players.name: Harry
players.description: You are Harry Potter! You are a very talented flier. Because your mother sacrificed herself for you, Lord Voldemort cannot touch you without causing great harm to himself.

items.itemDescription: You have the ability to fly!
You are immune to Lord Voldemort's touch!

players.name: Hermione

items.itemDescription: You have the ability to apparate!

players.description: You are Hermione Granger! You are the brightest witch of your age and can already apparate.
